Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA Chemistry Cystatin C Reagent and Calibrator for quantitative determination and calibration of Cystatin C in human serum and plasma using latex enhanced turbidimetric assay on ADVIA Chemistry systems
Indications for Use Summary: Reagent: For in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of Cystatin C in human serum or plasma on the ADVIA Chemistry systems; measurement aids in diagnosis and treatment of renal disease. Calibrator: For in vitro diagnostic use in calibration of Cystatin C method on ADVIA Chemistry systems.
